import {useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import './NuevaCuenta.css' const NuevaCuenta = () => { const [usuario, guardarUsuario] = useState({ email : '', password : '', confirmpassword : '', name : '' }) const {email, password, confirmpassword, name} = usuario const onChange = e =>{ guardarUsuario({ ...usuario, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() console.log(usuario) } return (

Crear nueva cuenta

 ); } export default NuevaCuenta;
